questions.title: Will you be working with the philosophy 'as open as possible' for your data?
Are there legal reasons why (some of your) data can not be completely open?
Are there business reasons why (some of your) data can not be completely open?
Where will you make your data available?

answers.label: This as been taken care of

questions.title: Did you work out the financial aspects of making the data available?

answers.label: This as been taken care of

questions.title: Will you be archiving data?
questions.text: Will you be storing (in cold storage) copies of your own data for a longer period after the project has ended?
